title: 淫了一手好湿啊！
author: ykc200
txt_content:
Minecraft
As freedom as alongThat everything in blockAs scary as the nightThat creeper crashingAs happy as dimondCause that was the best thing you needYou can make everything and break everythingBut when you happy,you have no one to laugh with

replies.author: dandantang
replies.txt_content:
大概是这样minecraft



作为沿自由

在块的一切

那样可怕的晚上

，爬山虎崩溃

作为快乐作为雕琢的钻石

原因是你需要的最好的事情

您可以让一切打破一切

但是，当你快乐，你有没有人笑

replies.author: dandantang
replies.txt_content:
ykc200 发表于 2012-5-31 21:38 
大SF自己坐
那你翻译一下呗~

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 geludan 于 2012-5-31 14:52 编辑 

Minecraft the merely miraculously mysterious minigame maintaining merry feelings for millions of minds, misery for mainly minigames
我才叫牛逼，顺便淫出了一句好句子，全都是alliteration。。。。

replies.author: guirulai
replies.txt_content:
dandantang 发表于 2012-5-31 08:49 
那你翻译一下呗~
＃minecraft迷随着自由所有块一样可怕的夜晚那爬虫崩溃快乐钻石因为那是你最需要的你可以让一切，打破一切但当你快乐的时候，没有人与你同甘共苦

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
guirulai 发表于 2012-5-31 14:54 
＃minecraft迷只是奇迹般地神秘的感情但是保持快乐的数百万人，痛苦为主要的迷你游戏
不是。。。
minecraft这个仅仅是有些奇迹般神秘的游戏，保持着数万思想的欢乐，对其他主要要是迷你游戏的游戏来说，是噩梦

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
Minecraft

As freedom as along（一个人的自由）
That everything in block（所有东西都是方块）
As scary as the night（在晚上担惊受怕）
That creeper crashing（然后jj怪爆炸）
As happy as dimond（得到钻石的快乐）
Cause that was the best thing you need（因为那是你须要最好的东西）
You can make everything and break everything（你可以创造，破坏任何东西）
But when you happy,you have no one to laugh with（（但当你快乐时，没任何人可以陪你一起笑）

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
guirulai 发表于 2012-5-31 14:57 
NIBUZHIDAO ?
我怎么不知道，我即兴想出来的

replies.author: dandantang
replies.txt_content:
When you bags full to the brim
After you have just finished building a house
When you do not have any armed blow you served on the Western Paradise.

dandantang 发表于 2012-5-31 21:43
